Imagery Description: Body: (a) Small nude youth, woman bending forward beside embracing couple (halfNon Sepcifieddraped woman, with longNon Sepcifiedhaired youth behind her), seated draped woman, (b) seated halfNon Sepcifieddraped woman holding up phiale in r. hand, seated nude youth with phiale in 1. hand, drapery over arms and behind back.
